setDrop

public void setDrop(Game game,
                    java.lang.String column)
             throws GameException
Sets a drop in specified column, if possible.

Parameters:
game - - The associated Game.
column - - The column identifier to set the drop into.
Throws:
GameException - Thrown, if a drop can't be inserted into specified column at this moment.

updateGame

public void updateGame(Game game)
Updates current game and underlying data (e.g. GameStatus or GameStatistic). Internally calls updateGame(Game, GameBoardSlot), but as no GameBoardSlot affected, the argument remains null

Parameters:
game - - The Game to update.
